hadiths.text: This hadith pertaining to the wild ass is reported on the authority of Abu Qatada. The rest of the hadith is the same but with this (variation of words) that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:" Is there with you some of its flesh?

chapter.eng-name: The prohibition of hunting game for the one who has entered Ihram for Hajj or for Umrah or for both
